heading: About Me
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

sections.title: A little about me.
sections.description: Hey! I'm Aniket Sahoo, a software engineer focused on building user-friendly, engaging applications. I have always been a dreamer, exploring one idea to the next. Through my internship experiences I realized code as the tools to execute them. Since then, I've been honing my skills in web technologies and am excited to kick off my professional journey.

sections.title: Who I want to be
sections.description: My goal is to build innovative tech products that are impactful and engaging. I would also love to contribute to the world of sportsâ€”my first and enduring passion.

sections.title: When I'm free
sections.description: I love mornings with a good book, playing basketball (7 national tournaments!), exploring other sports, and experimenting in the kitchen.
